worksData.name: PotatoCovidTracker
details: A website related to tracking details of COVID events (various dashboards).
Assigned responsibilities for designing the web pages and logo.

worksData.name: FEED MY FRIEND
details: A website for arranging shared purchases of meals from the cafeteria, where users can be both depositors and buyers.
Responsive, supporting usage through mobile devices.

worksData.name: Pha Mue Song Hor Jai
details: A second-hand clothing buying and selling website, where users can both list items for sale and make purchases through a chat feature.
Responsive, supporting usage through mobile devices.

worksData.name: Pasaloo
details: A website for language translation ( แปลภาษาลู )
Responsive, supporting usage through mobile devices.

worksData.name: Securefirst 2023 Web
details: A website for Securefirst 2023, organized by the Information Security Advisory Group. This website is dedicated to Capture The Flag (CTF) challenges and for member registration.

worksData.name: CE Next Gen Web
details: Designing a website for the CE Next Gen#1 camp at KMITL to be used for recruitment and announcing camp activities.

worksData.name: PaNan (LIFF)
details: A website on the Line Frontend Framework (LIFF) that serves as a form for users to check if they are involved in gambling activities or not.
Additionally, it provides informational content and news.
